      • setMeasureState

        public void setMeasureState(boolean state)
        Sets the measuring state and enables or disables the controls accordingly. It also refreshes the indicators.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to be set.

        public void enableStop(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the stop button.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable the stop button. False otherwise.
